test_cases.title: Login with valid username and password
steps: Enter a valid username in the Username field
Enter the correct password in the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the account dashboard
pre_verification_steps: Verify the session_status is not active (user is logged out)
post_verification_steps: Verify the session_status is active (user is logged in)
Verify user is redirected to the account dashboard

test_cases.title: Login with valid email and password
steps: Enter a valid email in the Email field
Enter the correct password in the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the account dashboard
pre_verification_steps: Verify the session_status is not active (user is logged out)
post_verification_steps: Verify the session_status is active (user is logged in)
Verify user is redirected to the account dashboard

test_cases.title: Login with invalid username and password
steps: Enter an invalid username in the Username field
Enter an incorrect password in the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials, and input fields remain populated

test_cases.title: Login with invalid email and password
steps: Enter an invalid email in the Email field
Enter an incorrect password in the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials, and input fields remain populated

test_cases.title: Login with empty username and password
steps: Leave the Username field empty
Leave the Password field empty
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating required fields, and input fields remain empty

test_cases.title: Login with empty email and password
steps: Leave the Email field empty
Leave the Password field empty
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating required fields, and input fields remain empty

test_cases.title: Login with valid username and incorrect password
steps: Enter a valid username in the Username field
Enter an incorrect password in the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials, and input fields remain populated

test_cases.title: Login with valid email and incorrect password
steps: Enter a valid email in the Email field
Enter an incorrect password in the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials, and input fields remain populated

test_cases.title: Login with special characters in username
steps: Enter a username containing special characters (e.g., @#$%) in the Username field
Enter a valid password in the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials, and input fields remain populated

test_cases.title: Login with special characters in email
steps: Enter an email containing special characters (e.g., test@#$.com) in the Email field
Enter a valid password in the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials, and input fields remain populated

test_cases.title: Login with maximum character length in username
steps: Enter a username with the maximum allowed characters (e.g., 255 characters) in the Username field
Enter a valid password in the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed if credentials are invalid, and input fields remain populated

test_cases.title: Login with maximum character length in email
steps: Enter an email with the maximum allowed characters (e.g., 255 characters) in the Email field
Enter a valid password in the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed if credentials are invalid, and input fields remain populated

test_cases.title: Submit valid Customer Lookup form with matching record
test_cases.workflow: Submit Customer Lookup form to find login information
steps: Enter a valid First Name in the First Name field
Enter a valid Last Name in the Last Name field
Enter a valid Address in the Address field
Enter a valid City in the City field
Select a valid State from the State dropdown
Enter a valid Zip Code in the Zip Code field
Enter a valid SSN in the SSN field
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: Recovery details are displayed for the matching record

test_cases.title: Submit Customer Lookup form with no matching record
test_cases.workflow: Submit Customer Lookup form to find login information
steps: Enter a valid First Name in the First Name field
Enter a valid Last Name in the Last Name field
Enter a valid Address in the Address field
Enter a valid City in the City field
Select a valid State from the State dropdown
Enter a valid Zip Code in the Zip Code field
Enter a valid SSN in the SSN field that does not match any record
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating no matching record was found

test_cases.title: Submit Customer Lookup form with all fields empty
test_cases.workflow: Submit Customer Lookup form to find login information
steps: Leave all fields empty
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that all fields are required

test_cases.title: Submit Customer Lookup form with missing First Name
test_cases.workflow: Submit Customer Lookup form to find login information
steps: Leave the First Name field empty
Enter a valid Last Name in the Last Name field
Enter a valid Address in the Address field
Enter a valid City in the City field
Select a valid State from the State dropdown
Enter a valid Zip Code in the Zip Code field
Enter a valid SSN in the SSN field
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the First Name field is required

test_cases.title: Submit Customer Lookup form with invalid Zip Code format
test_cases.workflow: Submit Customer Lookup form to find login information
steps: Enter a valid First Name in the First Name field
Enter a valid Last Name in the Last Name field
Enter a valid Address in the Address field
Enter a valid City in the City field
Select a valid State from the State dropdown
Enter an invalid Zip Code (e.g., 'ABCDE') in the Zip Code field
Enter a valid SSN in the SSN field
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the Zip Code format is invalid

test_cases.title: Submit Customer Lookup form with special characters in First Name
test_cases.workflow: Submit Customer Lookup form to find login information
steps: Enter special characters (e.g., '@#$%') in the First Name field
Enter a valid Last Name in the Last Name field
Enter a valid Address in the Address field
Enter a valid City in the City field
Select a valid State from the State dropdown
Enter a valid Zip Code in the Zip Code field
Enter a valid SSN in the SSN field
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the First Name field contains invalid characters

test_cases.title: Submit Customer Lookup form with maximum character length in all fields
test_cases.workflow: Submit Customer Lookup form to find login information
steps: Enter the maximum allowed characters in the First Name field
Enter the maximum allowed characters in the Last Name field
Enter the maximum allowed characters in the Address field
Enter the maximum allowed characters in the City field
Select a valid State from the State dropdown
Enter the maximum allowed characters in the Zip Code field
Enter the maximum allowed characters in the SSN field
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The system processes the form successfully if the inputs are valid

test_cases.title: Submit Customer Lookup form with leading and trailing spaces in all fields
test_cases.workflow: Submit Customer Lookup form to find login information
steps: Enter a valid First Name with leading and trailing spaces in the First Name field
Enter a valid Last Name with leading and trailing spaces in the Last Name field
Enter a valid Address with leading and trailing spaces in the Address field
Enter a valid City with leading and trailing spaces in the City field
Select a valid State from the State dropdown
Enter a valid Zip Code with leading and trailing spaces in the Zip Code field
Enter a valid SSN with leading and trailing spaces in the SSN field
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The system trims the spaces and processes the form successfully if the inputs are valid

test_cases.title: Successful registration with valid inputs
steps: Enter a valid First Name into the First Name field
Enter a valid Last Name into the Last Name field
Enter a valid Address into the Address field
Enter a valid City into the City field
Select a valid State from the State dropdown
Enter a valid Zip Code into the Zip Code field
Enter a valid Phone Number into the Phone # field
Enter a valid SSN into the SSN field
Enter a valid Username into the Username field
Enter a valid Password into the Password field
Re-enter the same valid Password into the Confirm Password field
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The account is successfully created, and the user is automatically logged in.
pre_verification_steps: Verify user is logged out initially
post_verification_steps: Verify user session state changed as expected

test_cases.title: Registration fails when a mandatory field is left empty
steps: Leave the First Name field empty
Enter valid inputs for all other fields
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the First Name field is required, and the account is not created.

test_cases.title: Registration fails when Password and Confirm Password do not match
steps: Enter valid inputs into all fields except the Password and Confirm Password fields
Enter a valid Password into the Password field
Enter a different value into the Confirm Password field
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the Password and Confirm Password fields must match, and the account is not created.

test_cases.title: Registration fails when SSN field is left empty
steps: Leave the SSN field empty
Enter valid inputs for all other fields
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the SSN field is required, and the account is not created.

test_cases.title: Registration fails when all fields are left empty
steps: Leave all fields empty
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that all fields are required, and the account is not created.

test_cases.title: Registration fails when Password field is left empty
steps: Enter valid inputs into all fields except the Password field
Leave the Password field empty
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the Password field is required, and the account is not created.

test_cases.title: Registration fails when invalid Zip Code is entered
steps: Enter valid inputs into all fields except the Zip Code field
Enter an invalid value (e.g., alphabetic characters) into the Zip Code field
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the Zip Code field must contain a valid value, and the account is not created.

test_cases.title: Successful registration with edge case values for fields
steps: Enter a valid First Name with special characters (e.g., O'Connor) into the First Name field
Enter a valid Last Name with special characters (e.g., Smith-Jones) into the Last Name field
Enter a valid Address with special characters (e.g., Apt #5) into the Address field
Enter a valid City with special characters (e.g., St. Louis) into the City field
Select a valid State from the State dropdown
Enter a valid Zip Code with leading zeros (e.g., 01234) into the Zip Code field
Enter a valid Phone Number with dashes (e.g., 123-456-7890) into the Phone # field
Enter a valid SSN with dashes (e.g., 123-45-6789) into the SSN field
Enter a valid Username with mixed case and numbers (e.g., User123) into the Username field
Enter a valid Password with special characters (e.g., P@ssw0rd!) into the Password field
Re-enter the same valid Password into the Confirm Password field
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The account is successfully created, and the user is automatically logged in.

test_cases.title: Open a new account with valid account type and funding source
test_cases.workflow: Open a new account with selected account type and funding source
steps: Click on 'Open New Account' button
Select a valid account type from the dropdown
Select a valid funding source from the dropdown
Click on 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: A new account is created with a unique account number, $100.00 is debited from the funding source, and $100.00 is credited to the new account

test_cases.title: Attempt to open a new account without selecting an account type
test_cases.workflow: Open a new account with selected account type and funding source
steps: Click on 'Open New Account' button
Leave the account type dropdown unselected
Select a valid funding source from the dropdown
Click on 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that account type must be selected

test_cases.title: Attempt to open a new account without selecting a funding source
test_cases.workflow: Open a new account with selected account type and funding source
steps: Click on 'Open New Account' button
Select a valid account type from the dropdown
Leave the funding source dropdown unselected
Click on 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that a funding source must be selected

test_cases.title: Attempt to open a new account with insufficient funds in the funding source
test_cases.workflow: Open a new account with selected account type and funding source
test_cases.preconditions: Funding source account has less than $100.00 balance
steps: Click on 'Open New Account' button
Select a valid account type from the dropdown
Select a funding source with insufficient funds from the dropdown
Click on 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating insufficient funds in the funding source

test_cases.title: Attempt to open a new account with empty funding source and account type
test_cases.workflow: Open a new account with selected account type and funding source
steps: Click on 'Open New Account' button
Leave both the account type and funding source dropdowns unselected
Click on 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that both account type and funding source must be selected

test_cases.title: Open a new account with boundary value of $100.00 in funding source
test_cases.workflow: Open a new account with selected account type and funding source
test_cases.preconditions: Funding source account has exactly $100.00 balance
steps: Click on 'Open New Account' button
Select a valid account type from the dropdown
Select a funding source with exactly $100.00 balance from the dropdown
Click on 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: A new account is created with a unique account number, $100.00 is debited from the funding source, and $100.00 is credited to the new account

test_cases.title: Open a new account with special characters in account type name
test_cases.workflow: Open a new account with selected account type and funding source
steps: Click on 'Open New Account' button
Select an account type with special characters (e.g., 'Savings@123') from the dropdown
Select a valid funding source from the dropdown
Click on 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: A new account is created with a unique account number, $100.00 is debited from the funding source, and $100.00 is credited to the new account

test_cases.title: Open a new account with maximum length account type name
test_cases.workflow: Open a new account with selected account type and funding source
steps: Click on 'Open New Account' button
Select an account type with the maximum allowed length (e.g., 50 characters) from the dropdown
Select a valid funding source from the dropdown
Click on 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: A new account is created with a unique account number, $100.00 is debited from the funding source, and $100.00 is credited to the new account

test_cases.title: Verify the presence of all Account Services options in the sidebar
steps: Locate the left sidebar titled 'Account Services'.
Verify the presence of the following options: Open New Account, Accounts Overview, Transfer Funds, Bill Pay, Find Transactions, Update Contact Info, Request Loan, Log Out.
test_cases.expected_result: All listed options are visible in the 'Account Services' sidebar.

test_cases.title: Verify the Accounts Overview heading is displayed
steps: Locate the 'Accounts Overview' heading on the page.
test_cases.expected_result: The 'Accounts Overview' heading is displayed on the page.

test_cases.title: Verify account details are displayed correctly
steps: Locate the account details section.
Verify the presence of the following elements: Account number, Balance, Available Amount, Combined total balance.
test_cases.expected_result: All account details are displayed correctly.

test_cases.title: Verify the Combined total balance is calculated correctly
test_cases.preconditions: At least two accounts are displayed with balances.
steps: Locate the individual account balances.
Locate the Combined total balance.
Verify that the Combined total balance equals the sum of the individual account balances.
test_cases.expected_result: The Combined total balance is correctly calculated as the sum of individual account balances.

test_cases.title: Verify the sidebar option 'Open New Account' is clickable
steps: Locate the 'Open New Account' option in the sidebar.
Click on the 'Open New Account' option.
test_cases.expected_result: The 'Open New Account' option is clickable and responds to user interaction.

test_cases.title: Verify the sidebar option 'Log Out' is clickable
steps: Locate the 'Log Out' option in the sidebar.
Click on the 'Log Out' option.
test_cases.expected_result: The 'Log Out' option is clickable and responds to user interaction.

test_cases.title: Verify the page handles no accounts gracefully
test_cases.preconditions: User has no accounts associated with their profile.
steps: Check the account details section.
Verify the message displayed when no accounts are available.
test_cases.expected_result: A user-friendly message is displayed indicating no accounts are available.

test_cases.title: Verify the page handles a large number of accounts gracefully
test_cases.preconditions: User has a large number of accounts associated with their profile.
steps: Check the account details section.
Verify that all accounts are displayed without layout issues or performance degradation.
test_cases.expected_result: All accounts are displayed correctly without layout issues or performance degradation.

test_cases.title: Verify special characters in account names are displayed correctly
test_cases.preconditions: User has accounts with special characters in their names.
steps: Locate the account names in the account details section.
Verify that special characters in account names are displayed correctly.
test_cases.expected_result: Special characters in account names are displayed correctly without encoding or rendering issues.

test_cases.title: Successful fund transfer with valid inputs
steps: Enter a valid amount (e.g., 100) in the Amount field
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
Select a valid To account number from the dropdown
Click on the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: Funds are successfully transferred, and a confirmation message is displayed

test_cases.title: Transfer fails when Amount field is left blank
steps: Leave the Amount field blank
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
Select a valid To account number from the dropdown
Click on the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the Amount field is required

test_cases.title: Transfer fails when From account number is not selected
steps: Enter a valid amount (e.g., 100) in the Amount field
Leave the From account number field unselected
Select a valid To account number from the dropdown
Click on the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the From account number is required

test_cases.title: Transfer fails when To account number is not selected
steps: Enter a valid amount (e.g., 100) in the Amount field
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
Leave the To account number field unselected
Click on the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the To account number is required

test_cases.title: Transfer fails when Amount is zero
steps: Enter 0 in the Amount field
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
Select a valid To account number from the dropdown
Click on the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the Amount must be greater than zero

test_cases.title: Transfer fails when Amount is a negative value
steps: Enter a negative value (e.g., -100) in the Amount field
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
Select a valid To account number from the dropdown
Click on the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the Amount must be a positive value

test_cases.title: Transfer fails when From and To account numbers are the same
steps: Enter a valid amount (e.g., 100) in the Amount field
Select the same account number for both From and To account fields
Click on the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the From and To account numbers cannot be the same

test_cases.title: Transfer fails when Amount exceeds available balance
test_cases.preconditions: Ensure the From account has a balance less than the entered Amount
steps: Enter an amount greater than the available balance (e.g., 1000 when balance is 500) in the Amount field
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
Select a valid To account number from the dropdown
Click on the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating insufficient balance

test_cases.title: Transfer fails when Amount contains special characters
steps: Enter an invalid value with special characters (e.g., $100) in the Amount field
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
Select a valid To account number from the dropdown
Click on the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the Amount must be a numeric value

test_cases.title: Transfer succeeds with maximum allowable Amount
test_cases.preconditions: Ensure the From account has a balance equal to or greater than the maximum allowable Amount
steps: Enter the maximum allowable Amount (e.g., 100000) in the Amount field
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
Select a valid To account number from the dropdown
Click on the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: Funds are successfully transferred, and a confirmation message is displayed

test_cases.title: Successful payment with valid inputs
test_cases.workflow: Send payment after completing all fields
steps: Enter a valid Payee Name
Enter a valid Address
Enter a valid City
Select a valid State from the dropdown
Enter a valid 5-digit Zip Code
Enter a valid 10-digit Phone Number
Enter a valid Account Number
Re-enter the same Account Number in the Verify Account Number field
Enter a valid payment Amount greater than zero
Select a valid From Account Number from the dropdown
Click the 'Send Payment' button
test_cases.expected_result: A confirmation message appears indicating the payment was successful

test_cases.title: Error when Payee Name is left blank
test_cases.workflow: Send payment after completing all fields
steps: Leave the Payee Name field blank
Fill out all other fields with valid inputs
Click the 'Send Payment' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message appears indicating that the Payee Name is required

test_cases.title: Error when Address is left blank
test_cases.workflow: Send payment after completing all fields
steps: Enter a valid Payee Name
Leave the Address field blank
Fill out all other fields with valid inputs
Click the 'Send Payment' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message appears indicating that the Address is required

test_cases.title: Error when Zip Code is invalid
test_cases.workflow: Send payment after completing all fields
steps: Enter a valid Payee Name
Enter a valid Address
Enter a valid City
Select a valid State from the dropdown
Enter an invalid Zip Code (e.g., less than 5 digits or contains letters)
Fill out all other fields with valid inputs
Click the 'Send Payment' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message appears indicating that the Zip Code is invalid

test_cases.title: Error when Account Number and Verify Account Number do not match
test_cases.workflow: Send payment after completing all fields
steps: Enter a valid Payee Name
Enter a valid Address
Enter a valid City
Select a valid State from the dropdown
Enter a valid 5-digit Zip Code
Enter a valid 10-digit Phone Number
Enter a valid Account Number
Enter a different Account Number in the Verify Account Number field
Enter a valid payment Amount greater than zero
Select a valid From Account Number from the dropdown
Click the 'Send Payment' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message appears indicating that the Account Number and Verify Account Number do not match

test_cases.title: Error when Amount is zero
test_cases.workflow: Send payment after completing all fields
steps: Enter a valid Payee Name
Enter a valid Address
Enter a valid City
Select a valid State from the dropdown
Enter a valid 5-digit Zip Code
Enter a valid 10-digit Phone Number
Enter a valid Account Number
Re-enter the same Account Number in the Verify Account Number field
Enter '0' in the Amount field
Select a valid From Account Number from the dropdown
Click the 'Send Payment' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message appears indicating that the Amount must be greater than zero

test_cases.title: Error when Phone Number is invalid
test_cases.workflow: Send payment after completing all fields
steps: Enter a valid Payee Name
Enter a valid Address
Enter a valid City
Select a valid State from the dropdown
Enter a valid 5-digit Zip Code
Enter an invalid Phone Number (e.g., less than 10 digits or contains letters)
Enter a valid Account Number
Re-enter the same Account Number in the Verify Account Number field
Enter a valid payment Amount greater than zero
Select a valid From Account Number from the dropdown
Click the 'Send Payment' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message appears indicating that the Phone Number is invalid

test_cases.title: Edge case: Maximum valid input lengths for all fields
test_cases.workflow: Send payment after completing all fields
steps: Enter the maximum allowed characters in the Payee Name field
Enter the maximum allowed characters in the Address field
Enter the maximum allowed characters in the City field
Select a valid State from the dropdown
Enter a valid 5-digit Zip Code
Enter a valid 10-digit Phone Number
Enter the maximum allowed digits in the Account Number field
Re-enter the same Account Number in the Verify Account Number field
Enter the maximum allowed Amount
Select a valid From Account Number from the dropdown
Click the 'Send Payment' button
test_cases.expected_result: A confirmation message appears indicating the payment was successful

test_cases.title: Edge case: Special characters in Payee Name
test_cases.workflow: Send payment after completing all fields
steps: Enter special characters (e.g., @#$%^&*) in the Payee Name field
Enter a valid Address
Enter a valid City
Select a valid State from the dropdown
Enter a valid 5-digit Zip Code
Enter a valid 10-digit Phone Number
Enter a valid Account Number
Re-enter the same Account Number in the Verify Account Number field
Enter a valid payment Amount greater than zero
Select a valid From Account Number from the dropdown
Click the 'Send Payment' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message appears indicating that special characters are not allowed in the Payee Name

test_cases.title: Search for transaction with valid Transaction ID
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Click on the 'Find by Transaction ID' option.
Enter a valid Transaction ID into the Transaction ID input field.
Click the 'Find Transactions' button.
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transaction is displayed in the results table showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount.
post_verification_steps: Verify application state changed as expected

test_cases.title: Search for transaction with alphanumeric Transaction ID
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Click on the 'Find by Transaction ID' option.
Enter a valid alphanumeric Transaction ID into the Transaction ID input field.
Click the 'Find Transactions' button.
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transaction is displayed in the results table showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount.
post_verification_steps: Verify application state changed as expected

test_cases.title: Search transactions with valid date
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown
Enter a valid date in MM-DD-YYYY format in the Date input field
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions for the entered date are displayed in the results table showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount
post_verification_steps: Verify application state changed as expected

test_cases.title: Search transactions with valid date range
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Click on the 'Find by Date Range' option.
Enter a valid start date in MM-DD-YYYY format in the Date Range input field.
Enter a valid end date in MM-DD-YYYY format in the Date Range input field.
Click the 'Find Transactions' button.
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions are displayed in the results table showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount.
post_verification_steps: Verify application state changed as expected

test_cases.title: Search transactions with valid amount
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Enter a valid amount (e.g., 100) in the Amount input field.
Click the Find Transactions button.
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions are displayed in the results table showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount.
post_verification_steps: Verify application state changed as expected

test_cases.title: Search transactions with decimal amount
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Enter a valid decimal amount (e.g., 100.50) in the Amount input field.
Click the Find Transactions button.
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions are displayed in the results table showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount.
post_verification_steps: Verify application state changed as expected

test_cases.title: Search transactions with past date having no transactions
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown
Enter a past date in MM-DD-YYYY format that has no transactions in the Date input field
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: No transactions are displayed in the results table, and a message indicating no matching transactions is shown
post_verification_steps: Verify application state changed as expected

test_cases.title: Attempt search with empty Transaction ID field
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Click on the 'Find by Transaction ID' option.
Leave the Transaction ID input field empty.
Click the 'Find Transactions' button.
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Transaction ID input field indicating that the field is required.

test_cases.title: Attempt search with invalid Transaction ID format
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Click on the 'Find by Transaction ID' option.
Enter an invalid Transaction ID (e.g., special characters or incorrect format) into the Transaction ID input field.
Click the 'Find Transactions' button.
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Transaction ID input field indicating that the input format is invalid.

test_cases.title: Attempt search with whitespace-only Transaction ID
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Click on the 'Find by Transaction ID' option.
Enter only whitespace characters into the Transaction ID input field.
Click the 'Find Transactions' button.
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Transaction ID input field indicating that the field is required.

test_cases.title: Attempt search without selecting an account
steps: Do not select an account from the account dropdown.
Click on the 'Find by Transaction ID' option.
Enter a valid Transaction ID into the Transaction ID input field.
Click the 'Find Transactions' button.
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the account dropdown indicating that the field is required.

test_cases.title: Search transactions with empty date field
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown
Leave the Date input field empty
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Date input field indicating that the field is required

test_cases.title: Search transactions with invalid date format
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown
Enter an invalid date format (e.g., DD-MM-YYYY or YYYY/MM/DD) in the Date input field
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Date input field indicating that the date must be in MM-DD-YYYY format

test_cases.title: Search transactions without selecting an account
steps: Leave the account dropdown unselected
Enter a valid date in MM-DD-YYYY format in the Date input field
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the account dropdown indicating that the field is required

test_cases.title: Search transactions with empty date range fields
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Click on the 'Find by Date Range' option.
Leave both the start date and end date fields empty.
Click the 'Find Transactions' button.
test_cases.expected_result: Inline validation messages appear next to both fields indicating that they are required.

test_cases.title: Search transactions with invalid date format
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Click on the 'Find by Date Range' option.
Enter an invalid date format (e.g., DD-MM-YYYY) in the start date field.
Enter an invalid date format (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD) in the end date field.
Click the 'Find Transactions' button.
test_cases.expected_result: Inline validation messages appear next to both fields indicating that the date must be in MM-DD-YYYY format.

test_cases.title: Search transactions with start date later than end date
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Click on the 'Find by Date Range' option.
Enter a start date that is later than the end date in MM-DD-YYYY format.
Click the 'Find Transactions' button.
test_cases.expected_result: Inline validation message appears indicating that the start date cannot be later than the end date.

test_cases.title: Search transactions with missing account selection
steps: Leave the account dropdown unselected.
Click on the 'Find by Date Range' option.
Enter valid dates in MM-DD-YYYY format in both the start date and end date fields.
Click the 'Find Transactions' button.
test_cases.expected_result: Inline validation message appears indicating that the account selection is required.

test_cases.title: Search transactions with empty amount field
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Leave the Amount input field empty.
Click the Find Transactions button.
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Amount input field indicating the field is required.

test_cases.title: Search transactions with invalid characters in amount field
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Enter invalid characters (e.g., 'abc') in the Amount input field.
Click the Find Transactions button.
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Amount input field indicating invalid input.

test_cases.title: Search transactions with negative amount
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Enter a negative amount (e.g., -50) in the Amount input field.
Click the Find Transactions button.
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Amount input field indicating invalid input.

test_cases.title: Search transactions without selecting an account
steps: Leave the account dropdown unselected.
Enter a valid amount (e.g., 100) in the Amount input field.
Click the Find Transactions button.
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the account dropdown indicating the field is required.

test_cases.title: Search transactions with special characters in amount field
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Enter special characters (e.g., '!@#$') in the Amount input field.
Click the Find Transactions button.
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Amount input field indicating invalid input.

test_cases.title: Search for transaction with maximum length Transaction ID
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Click on the 'Find by Transaction ID' option.
Enter a Transaction ID with the maximum allowed length into the Transaction ID input field.
Click the 'Find Transactions' button.
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transaction is displayed in the results table showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount.

test_cases.title: Search for transaction with minimum length Transaction ID
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Click on the 'Find by Transaction ID' option.
Enter a Transaction ID with the minimum allowed length into the Transaction ID input field.
Click the 'Find Transactions' button.
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transaction is displayed in the results table showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount.

test_cases.title: Search transactions with special characters in date field
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown
Enter special characters (e.g., ##-##-####) in the Date input field
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Date input field indicating that the date must be in MM-DD-YYYY format

test_cases.title: Search transactions with future date
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown
Enter a future date in MM-DD-YYYY format in the Date input field
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: No transactions are displayed in the results table, and a message indicating no matching transactions is shown

test_cases.title: Search transactions with date containing leading or trailing spaces
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown
Enter a valid date in MM-DD-YYYY format with leading or trailing spaces in the Date input field
Click the Find Transactions button
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions for the entered date are displayed in the results table showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount

test_cases.title: Search transactions with boundary date range
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Click on the 'Find by Date Range' option.
Enter the same date in both the start date and end date fields in MM-DD-YYYY format.
Click the 'Find Transactions' button.
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions for the specified date are displayed in the results table showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount.

test_cases.title: Search transactions with special characters in date fields
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Click on the 'Find by Date Range' option.
Enter special characters (e.g., ##-##-####) in the start date field.
Enter special characters (e.g., ##-##-####) in the end date field.
Click the 'Find Transactions' button.
test_cases.expected_result: Inline validation messages appear next to both fields indicating that the date must be in MM-DD-YYYY format.

test_cases.title: Search transactions with valid leap year date range
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Click on the 'Find by Date Range' option.
Enter a valid leap year date (e.g., 02-29-2024) in the start date field.
Enter a valid leap year date (e.g., 02-29-2024) in the end date field.
Click the 'Find Transactions' button.
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions for the specified leap year date are displayed in the results table showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount.

test_cases.title: Search transactions with maximum allowed amount
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Enter the maximum allowed amount (e.g., 999999999.99) in the Amount input field.
Click the Find Transactions button.
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions are displayed in the results table showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount.

test_cases.title: Search transactions with zero amount
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Enter zero (0) in the Amount input field.
Click the Find Transactions button.
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions are displayed in the results table showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount.

test_cases.title: Search transactions with leading and trailing spaces in amount field
steps: Select an account from the account dropdown.
Enter an amount with leading and trailing spaces (e.g., ' 100 ') in the Amount input field.
Click the Find Transactions button.
test_cases.expected_result: Matching transactions are displayed in the results table showing Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount.

test_cases.title: Update profile with valid information
steps: Enter 'John' in the First Name field
Enter 'Doe' in the Last Name field
Enter '123 Main St' in the Address field
Enter 'Springfield' in the City field
Select 'Illinois' from the State dropdown
Enter '62704' in the Zip Code field
Enter '555-123-4567' in the Phone Number field
Click the 'Update Profile' button
test_cases.expected_result: A confirmation message is displayed indicating the profile was successfully updated

test_cases.title: Attempt to update profile with empty fields
steps: Leave all fields empty
Click the 'Update Profile' button
test_cases.expected_result: Error messages are displayed for all required fields indicating they cannot be empty

test_cases.title: Attempt to update profile with invalid phone number format
steps: Enter 'John' in the First Name field
Enter 'Doe' in the Last Name field
Enter '123 Main St' in the Address field
Enter 'Springfield' in the City field
Select 'Illinois' from the State dropdown
Enter '62704' in the Zip Code field
Enter '12345' in the Phone Number field
Click the 'Update Profile' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating the phone number format is invalid

test_cases.title: Attempt to update profile with invalid zip code format
steps: Enter 'John' in the First Name field
Enter 'Doe' in the Last Name field
Enter '123 Main St' in the Address field
Enter 'Springfield' in the City field
Select 'Florida' from the State dropdown
Enter 'ABCDE' in the Zip Code field
Enter '555-123-4567' in the Phone Number field
Click the 'Update Profile' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating the zip code format is invalid

test_cases.title: Attempt to update profile with missing state selection
steps: Enter 'John' in the First Name field
Enter 'Doe' in the Last Name field
Enter '123 Main St' in the Address field
Enter 'Springfield' in the City field
Leave the State dropdown unselected
Enter '62704' in the Zip Code field
Enter '555-123-4567' in the Phone Number field
Click the 'Update Profile' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating the state field is required

test_cases.title: Update profile with maximum allowed characters in all fields
steps: Enter a 50-character string in the First Name field
Enter a 50-character string in the Last Name field
Enter a 100-character string in the Address field
Enter a 50-character string in the City field
Select 'California' from the State dropdown
Enter '99999' in the Zip Code field
Enter '555-555-5555' in the Phone Number field
Click the 'Update Profile' button
test_cases.expected_result: A confirmation message is displayed indicating the profile was successfully updated

test_cases.title: Attempt to update profile with special characters in name fields
steps: Enter 'J@hn!' in the First Name field
Enter 'D#e$' in the Last Name field
Enter '123 Main St' in the Address field
Enter 'Springfield' in the City field
Select 'Texas' from the State dropdown
Enter '75001' in the Zip Code field
Enter '555-987-6543' in the Phone Number field
Click the 'Update Profile' button
test_cases.expected_result: A confirmation message is displayed indicating the profile was successfully updated

test_cases.title: Update profile with numeric values in address field
steps: Enter 'John' in the First Name field
Enter 'Doe' in the Last Name field
Enter '1234567890' in the Address field
Enter 'Springfield' in the City field
Select 'Nevada' from the State dropdown
Enter '89044' in the Zip Code field
Enter '555-123-4567' in the Phone Number field
Click the 'Update Profile' button
test_cases.expected_result: A confirmation message is displayed indicating the profile was successfully updated

test_cases.title: Apply for a loan with valid inputs
steps: Enter a valid Loan Amount (e.g., 5000)
Enter a valid Down Payment (e.g., 1000)
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
Click on the 'Apply Now' button
test_cases.expected_result: Loan application is successfully submitted, and a confirmation message is displayed

test_cases.title: Internal error occurs during loan application
test_cases.preconditions: Simulate an internal error in the system
steps: Enter a valid Loan Amount (e.g., 5000)
Enter a valid Down Payment (e.g., 1000)
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
Click on the 'Apply Now' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the loan application could not be processed due to an internal error

test_cases.title: Leave Loan Amount field blank
steps: Leave the Loan Amount field empty
Enter a valid Down Payment (e.g., 1000)
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
Click on the 'Apply Now' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the Loan Amount field is mandatory

test_cases.title: Leave Down Payment field blank
steps: Enter a valid Loan Amount (e.g., 5000)
Leave the Down Payment field empty
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
Click on the 'Apply Now' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the Down Payment field is mandatory

test_cases.title: Leave From account number field blank
steps: Enter a valid Loan Amount (e.g., 5000)
Enter a valid Down Payment (e.g., 1000)
Leave the From account number field empty
Click on the 'Apply Now' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the From account number field is mandatory

test_cases.title: Enter zero as Loan Amount
steps: Enter 0 as the Loan Amount
Enter a valid Down Payment (e.g., 1000)
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
Click on the 'Apply Now' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the Loan Amount must be greater than zero

test_cases.title: Enter negative value as Down Payment
steps: Enter a valid Loan Amount (e.g., 5000)
Enter a negative value as Down Payment (e.g., -1000)
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
Click on the 'Apply Now' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the Down Payment must be a positive value

test_cases.title: Enter special characters in Loan Amount field
steps: Enter special characters (e.g., @#$%) in the Loan Amount field
Enter a valid Down Payment (e.g., 1000)
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
Click on the 'Apply Now' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the Loan Amount must be a numeric value

test_cases.title: Enter special characters in Down Payment field
steps: Enter a valid Loan Amount (e.g., 5000)
Enter special characters (e.g., @#$%) in the Down Payment field
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
Click on the 'Apply Now' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that the Down Payment must be a numeric value

test_cases.title: Verify successful logout redirects to login page
steps: Click on the 'Logout' button
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the login page
pre_verification_steps: Verify user is logged out initially
post_verification_steps: Verify user session state changed as expected

test_cases.title: Verify session data is cleared after logout
steps: Click on the 'Logout' button
Attempt to access a page that requires authentication
test_cases.expected_result: Access to the page is denied, and the user is redirected to the login page
pre_verification_steps: Verify user is logged out initially
post_verification_steps: Verify user session state changed as expected

test_cases.title: Verify no account information is accessible after logout
steps: Click on the 'Logout' button
Inspect browser storage (cookies, local storage, session storage) for any user-related data
test_cases.expected_result: No account information or sensitive data is present in the browser storage
pre_verification_steps: Verify user is logged out initially
post_verification_steps: Verify user session state changed as expected

test_cases.title: Verify logout functionality when session has already expired
steps: Click on the 'Logout' button
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the login page without errors

test_cases.title: Verify logout functionality when user is not logged in
steps: Click on the 'Logout' button
test_cases.expected_result: No action is performed, and the user remains on the current page or is redirected to the login page

test_cases.title: Verify logout button is functional when clicked multiple times
steps: Click on the 'Logout' button multiple times in quick succession
test_cases.expected_result: User is logged out successfully and redirected to the login page without errors

test_cases.title: Verify logout functionality when browser cookies are disabled
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and browser cookies are disabled
steps: Click on the 'Logout' button
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the login page, and no sensitive data remains accessible
